about.description: Being in the company of my four-legged colleagues, I am someone who finds satisfaction in turning coffee into effective front-end solutions. Currently deepening my knowledge in testing and performance, I aim for quality in every project. To get an idea of my work, take a look at my developments page.

options.feats: Being promoted to a senior developer in three years was not just a milestone in my career, it was a confirmation of my commitment to excellence, continuous evolution, and a passion for making a positive impact on every project I touch. This recognition reflects not just my individual effort, but also the supportive and inspiring environment I have encountered along the way, motivating me to overcome challenges and raise the standards of quality in our field.
options.goals: I am on a journey to become a ReactJs specialist, while also continuing to explore new technologies that enrich every project I touch. But more than that, my goal is to create digital experiences that stand out for both their usability and impact on end-users. I love collaborating directly with product and design teams, where I can contribute my ideas and see those contributions valued.
options.approach: My approach to development is not just about delivering projects, but about creating solutions that have a positive impact, whether for users or the team I collaborate with. I value teamwork, knowledge sharing, and am always ready to face new challenges with a spirit of collaboration and innovation. I believe that a project can only reach its full potential when everyone involved has an active voice and works in harmony.

projects.description: Some personal projects I worked on my own to improve my skills, showcase my work or just to take an idea of the paper

experiments.description: Here are some stuff I think is worth saving or just got curious and tried some small thing on CodePen

achievements.description: Check out my highlights to see how I've grown and stayed dedicated to doing great work

home.illustrationAlt: Illustration of Lina, a woman with olive skin tone, dark brown eyes, and curly black hair in a bob cut.
